wifiStrings.Instructions.SlideA.titleCop.translation: To connect to Cozmo you'll need to go to your device's WiFi settings

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.translation: Find and tap on your device's Settings icon

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide1.translation: Select the WiFi section from your Settings menu

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide2.translation: Choose Cozmo's network from the list

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide3.translation: Enter the WiFi password shown on your Cozmo

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide3.altCopy.translation: Don't see a password?  Tap Here:

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide4.translation: Exit Settings and tap on your Cozmo App

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide4altCopy.translation: The App will know when Cozmo is connected

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.viewAll.translation: Swipe to read all the instructions first!

wifi.gethelp.title.translation: Having trouble connecting to Cozmo's WiFi?

wifi.gethelp.description.translation:
Try the following:

1. Turn your device's WiFi OFF then back ON
2. Remove then place Cozmo on his charger

wifi.gethelp.description2.translation: If you need to see Cozmo's Network Info Raise and Lower his lift

wifi.gethelp.footer.translation:
Still stuck? Disconnect from Cozmo and navigate to:
support.anki.com
